Pre-Game Insights: After a thrilling ODI series win against South Africa, Babar Azam’s Pakistan will take on a depleted Proteas in a four-match T20I series.
The Proteas have lost quite a few of their players due to various reasons – few are out with injuries, whereas five others are in India to play in the IPL 2021.
In the absence of Temba Bevuma, Heinrich Klaasen will lead the hosts, while a swashbuckling Babar Azam continues to lead the visiting team.
Miscellaneous Highlights: All matches of the South Africa vs Pakistan 2021 series will be telecasted live on Star Sports network, live stream on the Disney+ Hotstar app and Jio TV.
